title: Mathematics Education Competency-Based Instructional Guide Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A project to develop teaching guides for strengthening math education competencies in collaborative digital environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the structure of a mathematics teaching guide according to the Documentational Approach to Didactics (DAD).
Learners can evaluate the richness of mathematical activities across four dimensions: content, process, cognitive demands, and classroom management.
Learners can diagnose strengths/weaknesses of existing mathematics teaching guides using analytical tools and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can develop and evaluate learner-customized mathematics teaching guide prototypes through project-based learning.

resources: Academic resources related to mathematics education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
